channel.title: Advanced Reporting on Amazon Connect SI Onboarding Workshop
channel.description: Recent content in Advanced Reporting on Amazon Connect SI Onboarding Workshop

item.title: Curriculum
item.description: Use Case Contact Center data is a critical requirement for our customers. In legacy solutions, customers were constrained to whatever reporting platform came with the ACD. Amazon Connect shifts that paradigm. The data that is generated from Amazon Connect belongs to the customer to do whatever they want with. Amazon Connect delivers data in a myriad of ways. Customers can access both historical and realtime data through the Connect UI. That data can be exported, scheduled, etc.

item.title: Resources
item.description: Documentation Quick Start for Streaming Amazon Connect Data to Redshift Amazon Connect Metrics and Contact Trace Records Contact Trace Records Data Model Connect Admin Guide Connect API Reference
